charges.charge_description: 18:1951 - INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE(1-2)

charges.charge_disposition: CBOP: 75 MONTHS as to Counts One, Two, Four, and Six, followed by 84 MONTHS as to Count Three, to be served CONSECUTIVELY to Counts One, Two, Four, and Six, for a total term of incarceration of 159 MONTHS. SUPERVISED RELEASE: 3 YEARS as to Counts One, Two, Four, and Six, and 5 YEARS as to Count Three to be served CONCURRENTLY for a total term of supervised release of 5 YEARS. RESTITUTION: $7,250.00. $500 SPECIAL ASSESSMENT.
